channel.title: Comments on: Replacement Pads For Sony’s MDR-V6 Headphones

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: They are still super comfortable after all day use. The ear pads wear out eventually and need to be replaced every year to year and half for me but I barely notice they are on my ears since they fit over the ear.
item.content:encoded: They are still super comfortable after all day use. The ear pads wear out eventually and need to be replaced every year to year and half for me but I barely notice they are on my ears since they fit over the ear.

item.title: By: MSK
item.dc:creator: MSK
item.description: Hi Russell! Nice post. I'm impressed by how heavily you've used the headphones, but is it still comfortable for 8-hour usage daily?
item.content:encoded: Hi Russell! Nice post. I’m impressed by how heavily you’ve used the headphones, but is it still comfortable for 8-hour usage daily?

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: The ones from Amazon are from Sony and are a complete replacement to the originals. They fit perfectly. It's so much better having proper headphone cushions again. Some people seem to really like these Beyerdynamic Velour replacement pads but I have not tried them. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0016MF7W2/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=thebloofrushe-20&linkCode=as2&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B0016MF7W2
item.content:encoded: The ones from Amazon are from Sony and are a complete replacement to the originals. They fit perfectly. It’s so much better having proper headphone cushions again. Some people seem to really like these Beyerdynamic Velour replacement pads but I have not tried them. http://www.amazon.com/gp/produ.....B0016MF7W2

item.title: By: Daniel
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: I ordered a pair of cushions off ebay they are about 1/2 inch too small they were about the same price you paid for your knock offs haha. Are the Amazon cushions as great as the originals? I love my mdrv6 cushions but they leave bits of matierial everywhere
item.content:encoded: I ordered a pair of cushions off ebay they are about 1/2 inch too small they were about the same price you paid for your knock offs haha. Are the Amazon cushions as great as the originals? I love my mdrv6 cushions but they leave bits of matierial everywhere
